snippet.title: RIFTSTORM Alpha Public Playtest Trailer
snippet.description:
PLAY RIFTSTORM FOR FREE FOR 2 WEEKS!

It's official, RIFTSTORM Alpha Playtest is HERE! You can join and play RIFTSTORM from 16-30 October 2024.

Access to our Alpha Playtest will be available through Steam once the Playtest period is live.
Add to wishlist to not miss out: mythic.link/RUODRr
